00059                 DBG_DrawWireframe = 1,
00060                 DBG_DrawAabb=2,

00062                 DBG_DrawContactPoints=8,

00093         virtual void    drawSphere(btScalar radius, const btTransform& transform, const btVector3& color)
00094         {
00095                 
00096                 btVector3 center = transform.getOrigin();
00097                 btVector3 up = transform.getBasis().getColumn(1);
00098                 btVector3 axis = transform.getBasis().getColumn(0);
00099                 btScalar minTh = -SIMD_HALF_PI;
00100                 btScalar maxTh = SIMD_HALF_PI;
00101                 btScalar minPs = -SIMD_HALF_PI;
00102                 btScalar maxPs = SIMD_HALF_PI;
00103                 btScalar stepDegrees = 30.f;
00104                 drawSpherePatch(center, up, axis, radius,minTh, maxTh, minPs, maxPs, color, stepDegrees ,false);
00105                 drawSpherePatch(center, up, -axis, radius,minTh, maxTh, minPs, maxPs, color, stepDegrees,false );
00106         }
00107         
00108         virtual void    drawSphere (const btVector3& p, btScalar radius, const btVector3& color)
00109         {
00110                 btTransform tr;
00111                 tr.setIdentity();
00112                 tr.setOrigin(p);
00113                 drawSphere(radius,tr,color);
00114         }

00137         virtual void drawAabb(const btVector3& from,const btVector3& to,const btVector3& color)
00138         {
00139 
00140                 btVector3 halfExtents = (to-from)* 0.5f;
00141                 btVector3 center = (to+from) *0.5f;
00142                 int i,j;
00143 
00144                 btVector3 edgecoord(1.f,1.f,1.f),pa,pb;
00145                 for (i=0;i<4;i++)
00146                 {
00147                         for (j=0;j<3;j++)
00148                         {
00149                                 pa = btVector3(edgecoord[0]*halfExtents[0], edgecoord[1]*halfExtents[1],                
00150                                         edgecoord[2]*halfExtents[2]);
00151                                 pa+=center;
00152 
00153                                 int othercoord = j%3;
00154                                 edgecoord[othercoord]*=-1.f;
00155                                 pb = btVector3(edgecoord[0]*halfExtents[0], edgecoord[1]*halfExtents[1],        
00156                                         edgecoord[2]*halfExtents[2]);
00157                                 pb+=center;
00158 
00159                                 drawLine(pa,pb,color);
00160                         }
00161                         edgecoord = btVector3(-1.f,-1.f,-1.f);
00162                         if (i<3)
00163                                 edgecoord[i]*=-1.f;
00164                 }
00165         }
00166         virtual void drawTransform(const btTransform& transform, btScalar orthoLen)
00167         {
00168                 btVector3 start = transform.getOrigin();
00169                 drawLine(start, start+transform.getBasis() * btVector3(orthoLen, 0, 0), btVector3(1.f,0.3,0.3));
00170                 drawLine(start, start+transform.getBasis() * btVector3(0, orthoLen, 0), btVector3(0.3,1.f, 0.3));
00171                 drawLine(start, start+transform.getBasis() * btVector3(0, 0, orthoLen), btVector3(0.3, 0.3,1.f));
00172         }

00174         virtual void drawArc(const btVector3& center, const btVector3& normal, const btVector3& axis, btScalar radiusA, btScalar radiusB, btScalar minAngle, btScalar maxAngle, 
00175                                 const btVector3& color, bool drawSect, btScalar stepDegrees = btScalar(10.f))
00176         {
00177                 const btVector3& vx = axis;
00178                 btVector3 vy = normal.cross(axis);
00179                 btScalar step = stepDegrees * SIMD_RADS_PER_DEG;
00180                 int nSteps = (int)btFabs((maxAngle - minAngle) / step);
00181                 if(!nSteps) nSteps = 1;
00182                 btVector3 prev = center + radiusA * vx * btCos(minAngle) + radiusB * vy * btSin(minAngle);
00183                 if(drawSect)
00184                 {
00185                         drawLine(center, prev, color);
00186                 }
00187                 for(int i = 1; i <= nSteps; i++)
00188                 {
00189                         btScalar angle = minAngle + (maxAngle - minAngle) * btScalar(i) / btScalar(nSteps);
00190                         btVector3 next = center + radiusA * vx * btCos(angle) + radiusB * vy * btSin(angle);
00191                         drawLine(prev, next, color);
00192                         prev = next;
00193                 }
00194                 if(drawSect)
00195                 {
00196                         drawLine(center, prev, color);
00197                 }
00198         }
00199         virtual void drawSpherePatch(const btVector3& center, const btVector3& up, const btVector3& axis, btScalar radius, 
00200                 btScalar minTh, btScalar maxTh, btScalar minPs, btScalar maxPs, const btVector3& color, btScalar stepDegrees = btScalar(10.f),bool drawCenter = true)
00201         {
00202                 btVector3 vA[74];
00203                 btVector3 vB[74];
00204                 btVector3 *pvA = vA, *pvB = vB, *pT;
00205                 btVector3 npole = center + up * radius;
00206                 btVector3 spole = center - up * radius;
00207                 btVector3 arcStart;
00208                 btScalar step = stepDegrees * SIMD_RADS_PER_DEG;
00209                 const btVector3& kv = up;
00210                 const btVector3& iv = axis;
00211                 btVector3 jv = kv.cross(iv);
00212                 bool drawN = false;
00213                 bool drawS = false;
00214                 if(minTh <= -SIMD_HALF_PI)
00215                 {
00216                         minTh = -SIMD_HALF_PI + step;
00217                         drawN = true;
00218                 }
00219                 if(maxTh >= SIMD_HALF_PI)
00220                 {
00221                         maxTh = SIMD_HALF_PI - step;
00222                         drawS = true;
00223                 }
00224                 if(minTh > maxTh)
00225                 {
00226                         minTh = -SIMD_HALF_PI + step;
00227                         maxTh =  SIMD_HALF_PI - step;
00228                         drawN = drawS = true;
00229                 }
00230                 int n_hor = (int)((maxTh - minTh) / step) + 1;
00231                 if(n_hor < 2) n_hor = 2;
00232                 btScalar step_h = (maxTh - minTh) / btScalar(n_hor - 1);
00233                 bool isClosed = false;
00234                 if(minPs > maxPs)
00235                 {
00236                         minPs = -SIMD_PI + step;
00237                         maxPs =  SIMD_PI;
00238                         isClosed = true;
00239                 }
00240                 else if((maxPs - minPs) >= SIMD_PI * btScalar(2.f))
00241                 {
00242                         isClosed = true;
00243                 }
00244                 else
00245                 {
00246                         isClosed = false;
00247                 }
00248                 int n_vert = (int)((maxPs - minPs) / step) + 1;
00249                 if(n_vert < 2) n_vert = 2;
00250                 btScalar step_v = (maxPs - minPs) / btScalar(n_vert - 1);
00251                 for(int i = 0; i < n_hor; i++)
00252                 {
00253                         btScalar th = minTh + btScalar(i) * step_h;
00254                         btScalar sth = radius * btSin(th);
00255                         btScalar cth = radius * btCos(th);
00256                         for(int j = 0; j < n_vert; j++)
00257                         {
00258                                 btScalar psi = minPs + btScalar(j) * step_v;
00259                                 btScalar sps = btSin(psi);
00260                                 btScalar cps = btCos(psi);
00261                                 pvB[j] = center + cth * cps * iv + cth * sps * jv + sth * kv;
00262                                 if(i)
00263                                 {
00264                                         drawLine(pvA[j], pvB[j], color);
00265                                 }
00266                                 else if(drawS)
00267                                 {
00268                                         drawLine(spole, pvB[j], color);
00269                                 }
00270                                 if(j)
00271                                 {
00272                                         drawLine(pvB[j-1], pvB[j], color);
00273                                 }
00274                                 else
00275                                 {
00276                                         arcStart = pvB[j];
00277                                 }
00278                                 if((i == (n_hor - 1)) && drawN)
00279                                 {
00280                                         drawLine(npole, pvB[j], color);
00281                                 }
00282                                 
00283                                 if (drawCenter)
00284                                 {
00285                                         if(isClosed)
00286                                         {
00287                                                 if(j == (n_vert-1))
00288                                                 {
00289                                                         drawLine(arcStart, pvB[j], color);
00290                                                 }
00291                                         }
00292                                         else
00293                                         {
00294                                                 if(((!i) || (i == (n_hor-1))) && ((!j) || (j == (n_vert-1))))
00295                                                 {
00296                                                         drawLine(center, pvB[j], color);
00297                                                 }
00298                                         }
00299                                 }
00300                         }
00301                         pT = pvA; pvA = pvB; pvB = pT;
00302                 }
00303         }

00306         virtual void drawBox(const btVector3& bbMin, const btVector3& bbMax, const btVector3& color)
00307         {
00308                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), color);
00309                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), color);
00310                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), color);
00311                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), color);
00312                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00313                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00314                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00315                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00316                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00317                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00318                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00319                 drawLine(btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00320         }
00321         virtual void drawBox(const btVector3& bbMin, const btVector3& bbMax, const btTransform& trans, const btVector3& color)
00322         {
00323                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), color);
00324                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), color);
00325                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), color);
00326                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), color);
00327                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00328                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMin[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00329                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00330                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMin[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00331                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00332                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00333                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMax[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00334                 drawLine(trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMax[1], bbMax[2]), trans * btVector3(bbMin[0], bbMin[1], bbMax[2]), color);
00335         }

00337         virtual void drawCapsule(btScalar radius, btScalar halfHeight, int upAxis, const btTransform& transform, const btVector3& color)
00338         {
00339                 int stepDegrees = 30;
00340 
00341                 btVector3 capStart(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00342                 capStart[upAxis] = -halfHeight;
00343 
00344                 btVector3 capEnd(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00345                 capEnd[upAxis] = halfHeight;
00346 
00347                 // Draw the ends
00348                 {
00349 
00350                         btTransform childTransform = transform;
00351                         childTransform.getOrigin() = transform * capStart;
00352                         {
00353                                 btVector3 center = childTransform.getOrigin();
00354                                 btVector3 up = childTransform.getBasis().getColumn((upAxis+1)%3);
00355                                 btVector3 axis = -childTransform.getBasis().getColumn(upAxis);
00356                                 btScalar minTh = -SIMD_HALF_PI;
00357                                 btScalar maxTh = SIMD_HALF_PI;
00358                                 btScalar minPs = -SIMD_HALF_PI;
00359                                 btScalar maxPs = SIMD_HALF_PI;
00360                                 
00361                                 drawSpherePatch(center, up, axis, radius,minTh, maxTh, minPs, maxPs, color, btScalar(stepDegrees) ,false);
00362                         }
00363 
00364 
00365 
00366                 }
00367 
00368                 {
00369                         btTransform childTransform = transform;
00370                         childTransform.getOrigin() = transform * capEnd;
00371                         {
00372                                 btVector3 center = childTransform.getOrigin();
00373                                 btVector3 up = childTransform.getBasis().getColumn((upAxis+1)%3);
00374                                 btVector3 axis = childTransform.getBasis().getColumn(upAxis);
00375                                 btScalar minTh = -SIMD_HALF_PI;
00376                                 btScalar maxTh = SIMD_HALF_PI;
00377                                 btScalar minPs = -SIMD_HALF_PI;
00378                                 btScalar maxPs = SIMD_HALF_PI;
00379                                 drawSpherePatch(center, up, axis, radius,minTh, maxTh, minPs, maxPs, color, btScalar(stepDegrees) ,false);
00380                         }
00381                 }
00382 
00383                 // Draw some additional lines
00384                 btVector3 start = transform.getOrigin();
00385 
00386                 for (int i=0;i<360;i+=stepDegrees)
00387                 {
00388                         capEnd[(upAxis+1)%3] = capStart[(upAxis+1)%3] = btSin(btScalar(i)*SIMD_RADS_PER_DEG)*radius;
00389                         capEnd[(upAxis+2)%3] = capStart[(upAxis+2)%3]  = btCos(btScalar(i)*SIMD_RADS_PER_DEG)*radius;
00390                         drawLine(start+transform.getBasis() * capStart,start+transform.getBasis() * capEnd, color);
00391                 }
00392                 
00393         }

00395         virtual void drawCylinder(btScalar radius, btScalar halfHeight, int upAxis, const btTransform& transform, const btVector3& color)
00396         {
00397                 btVector3 start = transform.getOrigin();
00398                 btVector3       offsetHeight(0,0,0);
00399                 offsetHeight[upAxis] = halfHeight;
00400                 int stepDegrees=30;
00401                 btVector3 capStart(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00402                 capStart[upAxis] = -halfHeight;
00403                 btVector3 capEnd(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00404                 capEnd[upAxis] = halfHeight;
00405 
00406                 for (int i=0;i<360;i+=stepDegrees)
00407                 {
00408                         capEnd[(upAxis+1)%3] = capStart[(upAxis+1)%3] = btSin(btScalar(i)*SIMD_RADS_PER_DEG)*radius;
00409                         capEnd[(upAxis+2)%3] = capStart[(upAxis+2)%3]  = btCos(btScalar(i)*SIMD_RADS_PER_DEG)*radius;
00410                         drawLine(start+transform.getBasis() * capStart,start+transform.getBasis() * capEnd, color);
00411                 }
00412                 // Drawing top and bottom caps of the cylinder
00413                 btVector3 yaxis(0,0,0);
00414                 yaxis[upAxis] = btScalar(1.0);
00415                 btVector3 xaxis(0,0,0);
00416                 xaxis[(upAxis+1)%3] = btScalar(1.0);
00417                 drawArc(start-transform.getBasis()*(offsetHeight),transform.getBasis()*yaxis,transform.getBasis()*xaxis,radius,radius,0,SIMD_2_PI,color,false,btScalar(10.0));
00418                 drawArc(start+transform.getBasis()*(offsetHeight),transform.getBasis()*yaxis,transform.getBasis()*xaxis,radius,radius,0,SIMD_2_PI,color,false,btScalar(10.0));
00419         }
00420 
00421         virtual void drawCone(btScalar radius, btScalar height, int upAxis, const btTransform& transform, const btVector3& color)
00422         {
00423                 int stepDegrees = 30;
00424                 btVector3 start = transform.getOrigin();
00425 
00426                 btVector3       offsetHeight(0,0,0);
00427                 btScalar halfHeight = height * btScalar(0.5);
00428                 offsetHeight[upAxis] = halfHeight;
00429                 btVector3       offsetRadius(0,0,0);
00430                 offsetRadius[(upAxis+1)%3] = radius;
00431                 btVector3       offset2Radius(0,0,0);
00432                 offset2Radius[(upAxis+2)%3] = radius;
00433 
00434 
00435                 btVector3 capEnd(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00436                 capEnd[upAxis] = -halfHeight;
00437 
00438                 for (int i=0;i<360;i+=stepDegrees)
00439                 {
00440                         capEnd[(upAxis+1)%3] = btSin(btScalar(i)*SIMD_RADS_PER_DEG)*radius;
00441                         capEnd[(upAxis+2)%3] = btCos(btScalar(i)*SIMD_RADS_PER_DEG)*radius;
00442                         drawLine(start+transform.getBasis() * (offsetHeight),start+transform.getBasis() * capEnd, color);
00443                 }
00444 
00445                 drawLine(start+transform.getBasis() * (offsetHeight),start+transform.getBasis() * (-offsetHeight+offsetRadius),color);
00446                 drawLine(start+transform.getBasis() * (offsetHeight),start+transform.getBasis() * (-offsetHeight-offsetRadius),color);
00447                 drawLine(start+transform.getBasis() * (offsetHeight),start+transform.getBasis() * (-offsetHeight+offset2Radius),color);
00448                 drawLine(start+transform.getBasis() * (offsetHeight),start+transform.getBasis() * (-offsetHeight-offset2Radius),color);
00449 
00450                 // Drawing the base of the cone
00451                 btVector3 yaxis(0,0,0);
00452                 yaxis[upAxis] = btScalar(1.0);
00453                 btVector3 xaxis(0,0,0);
00454                 xaxis[(upAxis+1)%3] = btScalar(1.0);
00455                 drawArc(start-transform.getBasis()*(offsetHeight),transform.getBasis()*yaxis,transform.getBasis()*xaxis,radius,radius,0,SIMD_2_PI,color,false,10.0);
00456         }
00457 
00458         virtual void drawPlane(const btVector3& planeNormal, btScalar planeConst, const btTransform& transform, const btVector3& color)
00459         {
00460                 btVector3 planeOrigin = planeNormal * planeConst;
00461                 btVector3 vec0,vec1;
00462                 btPlaneSpace1(planeNormal,vec0,vec1);
00463                 btScalar vecLen = 100.f;
00464                 btVector3 pt0 = planeOrigin + vec0*vecLen;
00465                 btVector3 pt1 = planeOrigin - vec0*vecLen;
00466                 btVector3 pt2 = planeOrigin + vec1*vecLen;
00467                 btVector3 pt3 = planeOrigin - vec1*vecLen;
00468                 drawLine(transform*pt0,transform*pt1,color);
00469                 drawLine(transform*pt2,transform*pt3,color);
00470         }
00471 
00472         virtual void clearLines()
00473         {
00474         }
00475 
00476         virtual void flushLines()
00477         {
